name: bigdft-atlab

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description: BigDFT-atlab: library for ATomic related operations.

dependencies.name: gnuconfig
dependencies.description:
The GNU config.guess and config.sub scripts versioned by timestamp.
This package can be used as a build dependency for autotools packages
that ship a tarball with outdated config.guess and config.sub files.

dependencies.name: mpi
dependencies.description: Cray/HPE packaging of MVAPICH2 for HPE Apollo systems

dependencies.name: openbabel
dependencies.description:
Open Babel is a chemical toolbox designed to speak the many languages of
chemical data. It's an open, collaborative project allowing anyone to
search, convert, analyze, or store data from molecular modeling,
chemistry, solid-state materials, biochemistry, or related areas.

dependencies.name: bigdft-futile
dependencies.description:
BigDFT-futile: a library handling most common FORTRAN low-level
operations, like memory managment, profiling routines, I/O operations.
It also supports yaml output and parsing for fortran programs. It also
provides wrappers routines to MPI and linear algebra operations. This
library is intensively used in BigDFT packages.

dependent_to.name: bigdft-psolver
dependent_to.description:
BigDFT-Psolver: a flexible real-space Poisson Solver based on
Interpolating Scaling Functions. It constitutes a fundamental building
block of BigDFT code, and it can also be used separately and linked to
other codes.

dependent_to.name: bigdft-chess
dependent_to.description:
BigDFT-CheSS: A module for performing Fermi Operator Expansions via
Chebyshev Polynomials.

dependent_to.name: bigdft-suite
dependent_to.description:
BigDFT-suite: the complete suite of BigDFT for electronic structure
calculation based on Daubechies wavelets.
